rules_text:
Flying, defender
{T}: Dormant Dragon deals 1 damage to any target. Promote Dormant Dragon. [i](Put a loyalty counter on it. Then if it has three or more loyalty counters on it, transform it.)[/i]
special_text2:
Flying
[-1]: Shrieking Hellkite deals 2 damage to any target.
[-3]: Untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.
